node.npcText: I'm being tailed! Let's go faster!
I'm serious. Her husband is following me.

answer.text: Ha-ha. And where is your clothing?
Wow, family drama. Will do my best!
Hey man, we still stand on the same place. <sprite=6>

node.npcText: Too much questions, he will kill me!
Thanks Bro! You will save my balls!
